title: Top 10 signs your kid is #AltRight
author: VD
content_html:
These three were my favorites:

  • They refer to you as a “cuck” when you put on FOX News.
  • They refer to their curfew as “the downfall of Western civilization.”
  • When you ask them which Disney or Pixar character they want to show up to their birthday party, they scream at you and say: “I only want Pepe!”
content_text:
These three
were my favorites:
They refer to you as a “cuck” when you put on FOX News.
They refer to their curfew as “the downfall of Western civilization.”
When you ask them which Disney or Pixar character they want to show up to their birthday party, they scream at you and say: “I only want Pepe!”
